subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements I and II. Statement I: Dumas method is used for estimation of "Nitrogen" in an organic compound. Statement II: Dumas method involves the formation of ammonium sulphate by heating the organic compound with conc options given below

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(3) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
